ComicInfo.Penciller: Nick Cardy,John Calnan,Gray Morrow,Tony DeZuniga,Lee Elias,Bill Draut
ComicInfo.Title: Never Kill a Witch!; The Spell of Sinner Ella!; You Can't Hide from Death; The Wondrous Witch's Cauldron; The Curse of the Cat
ComicInfo.Summary:
Never Kill a Witch!: Harry and Stella break into Old Lady Crafton's house to steal her money so they can get married but find out what happens when you kill a witch.
The Spell of Sinner Ella!: Ella's fairy godmother sends her to the fancy ball but she must be home by midnight.
You Can't Hide from Death: Claude pursues Henri across France to finish the duel that had begun years before.
The Wondrous Witch's Cauldron: A witch's cauldron that brings it's owner fame, fortune and long life passes from owner to owner.
The Curse of the Cat: A begger tells Mr. Fleming of a fortune buried in a cat's grave.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
